com.business

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.business.Validator

  • public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to validate the operations that can be done using this application.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ClientsDAO clientsDAO
      Used for accessing the database to make queries related to clients

      Used for accessing the database to make queries related to orders

      Used for accessing the database to make queries related to products

    • Constructor Detail

      • Validator

        public Validator()

    • Method Detail

      • validateClientReport

        public void validateClientReport()
        Validates the report client operation. The report will be generated only if at least one client is found in the database.

      • validateProductReport

        public void validateProductReport()
        Validates the report product operation. The report will be generated only if at least one product is found in the database.

      • validateOrderReport

        public void validateOrderReport()
        Validates the report orders operation. The report will be generated only if at least one client and one order is found.

      • validateInsertOrDeleteClient

        public void validateInsertOrDeleteClient(java.lang.String command,
                                         boolean insert)
        Validates the delete or insert client operations. If the command string corresponds to the valid format, the method calls the insert or delete operations found in the ClientOperations class.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to insert or delete a client.
        insert - If true insert will be performed, if false delete will be performed.

      • validateInsertProduct

        public void validateInsertProduct(java.lang.String command)
        Validates the insert product operation. If the command string corresponds to the valid format, the method calls the insert operation found in the ProductOperations class.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to insert a product.

      • validateDeleteProduct

        public void validateDeleteProduct(java.lang.String command)
        Validates the delete product operation. If the command string corresponds to the valid format, the method calls the delete operation found in the ProductOperations class.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to delete a product.

      • validateOrder

        public void validateOrder(java.lang.String command)
        Validates the place order operation. If the command string corresponds to the valid format, the method calls the place order operation found in the OrderOperations class.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to place an order.

      • validateString

        private boolean validateString(java.lang.String validate)
        Checks if a string is correct. To be correct it must have less than 45 characters and to contain only letters.
        Parameters:
        validate - The string that must be validated.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the string format is correct, otherwise false.

      • validateDouble

        private boolean validateDouble(java.lang.String validate)
        Checks if a string contains a double.
        Parameters:
        validate - The string that must be validated.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the string contains a double, otherwise false
